Name: Starsoul Mace
SpecialEffect: Do Not Use the Attack Sequence fo an attack with a Starsoul Mace. Instead roll a dice. On a 2+, the target suffers D3 mortal Wounds

Name: Draconic Flamestream
SpecialEffect: Do Not Use the Attack Sequence fo an attack made with a Draconic Flamestream. Instead roll a dice. On a 1-2, nothing happens. On a 3-4 the target suffers D3 Mortal wounds. On a 5-6 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds.

Name: Stormblast
SpecialEffect: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Stormblast. Instead roll a dice. On a 4+, the taret suffers D3 mortal wounds

Name: Heldensen
SpecialEffect: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Heldensen if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.

Name: Volleystorm Crossbow
SpecialEffect: If an attack made with a Volleystorm Crossbow scores a hit, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

Name: Thunderaxe
SpecialEffect: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of  a Thunderaxe if the number of models in the target unit is greater than the number of models in this unit.

Name: Lightning Hammer
SpecialEffect: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Lightning Hammer is 6, the target suffers 2 mortal wounds and teh attack sequence ends.

Name: Draconic Flamestream
SpecialEffect: Do not use the attack sequenzce for an attack made with a Draconic Flamestream. Instead, roll a dice. On a 1-2, nothing happens. On a 3-4, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 5-6, the target suffers D6 mortal wounds.
